name: Contra Remake (Chris Thorsen)
description:
For MSU's Intro to coding for game design class, we were tasked with recreating a classic game, and me and my partner chose Contra. Our remake includes everything up to the boss in level 1. Check out the original game: https://www.retrogames.cz/play_022-NES.php?language=EN

Arrow keys to move, z to shoot, and x to jump!
